name: Best partner:fighting
description:
This is a game of escalating and duels. You could summon, collect and train animals to win the battle. And this game has the most unique evolution and battle experiences .
Game Features:
1.Train and evolution
Hundreds of characters and unique innovative play will bring a game experience you've never experienced . Upgrade with scarce props.
2.SUMMON ANIMALS
Summon animals and collect them to make an invincible team.
3.FIERCE COMBAT
You can form a team with others to fight and upgrade together
4.TOP RANKING
You can reach the team's first place by constantly upgrading
